website_summaries.verdict: Ariat engineers have been taking strides in improving their hiking products over the years, and their advancements couldn’t be more evident in the Terrain Pro. From its excessively comfortable build and eye-catching design to its satisfying fit and wallet-friendly price tag, this day hiking boot is clearly intent on making the competition have a good run for their money. That said, Ariat’s baby is not the juggernaut it wants to be as it failed to power through the wall of criticism of those who wanted a lasting lockdown out of its laces. Overall, if people would just tie the boot’s laces tighter—or, perhaps, replace them with ideal ones altogether—there would be no stopping the Ariat Terrain Pro from ending up on their feet and be perfectly happy about it.
pros: The overall design of the Terrain Pro captivated the hearts of many
A lot of purchasers flat-out praised this boot for its reasonable asking price
The Ariat Terrain Pro had a level of comfort that amazed dozens of reviewers
Some users were more than impressed with the boot’s excellent fit
Based on a handful of Terrain Pro reviews, this hiking footwear had a highly supportive ankle collar
This boot effortlessly received 5-star ratings from several users for its towering durability
Boot lovers by the handful concluded that this hiking gear had no break-in period
According to a few Ariat loyalists, the Terrain Pro’s traction was nothing short of brilliant whether over dry land or wet rocks
cons: A very small percentage of users disliked the boot’s laces for being too slick
One particular wearer had to do a double knot just to achieve a more reassuring lockdown

customer_reviews.title: True to fit and very comfortable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I love Ariat shoes / boots. After buying several pairs of Ariat boots, I thought I would try some hiking boots for going hunting and tough terrain type boots. Well, I absolutely wasn't disappointed with these hiking boots. I think true to fit and very comfortable out of the box. I used these daily on a recent hunting trip in relatively rough and rocky terrain and remained very comfortable. I would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, just didn't fit me!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice boots! Way better than the standard Terrains. Unfortunately these did not fit me (usually a women's size 10, ordered an 8...should have gotten an 8.5) they were just a tiny bit too small and rubber my toe and slid around on my heels. Maybe it's because I'm a woman and these are more fit for men's feet...I just couldn't deal with the choices of pink or purple cami for the women's Pro Terrains. Come on ariat, not every woman loves pink and purple! The color is true to the image, and these are great quality..I'd recommend ordering half a size up though.
customer_reviews.author: Kellery

customer_reviews.title: Good horse riding boots.
customer_reviews.text: These are riding boots, not hiking boots. For horse riding they are perfect. The sole tread is made for stirrup use, so is the heel shape. They have a spur rest, good ankle flexibility, and they are not too wide.
customer_reviews.author: andcr

customer_reviews.title: High quality, nice boot, but had issues.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice boots, but for me they slipped on the heel, and I could not seem to correct this. Tried double socks, even no slip hill stickers, and they just slipped.. Wish I could have kept them, but I ended up sending them back. If they don't slip on you, then they are a great boot.
customer_reviews.author: Fratm

customer_reviews.title: Simply outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: The excellent quality and fit I've come to expect from Ariat. My 5th pair from them in the last ten years. I wear these at least three days per week around barn, pastures and ride in them - couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: COS

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, I was looking for a good pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, I was looking for a good pair of working boots that I could use for everything and these are it. I've been in puddles ankle high and my feet stay dry and the best part is my boots never loses its original color. They are very sturdy and have great support which is needed when working on uneven ground, a little pricey but it's worth it in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite boot this is the third pair I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Little hard from beginning,after a week of wearing they're break perfect
customer_reviews.author: Typa

customer_reviews.title: These boots are comfortable and fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: These boots are comfortable and fit as expected. I use them for work and have not had any issues at all. They have decent grip and stand up to a lot of abuse. I am expecting these to last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: john allan

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Ariat!!
customer_reviews.text: Ariat Terrain boots are the best best if ever owned. This make the 4th pair I've purchased over the years and the are all exceptional quality and are ALL still in use for various applications.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Berkner

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, but they feel like they need inserts for more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that the soles don't clog up with dirt easily
customer_reviews.text: Took about three weeks to break these shoes in, a little longer than I expected. They are holding up well. I like that the soles don't clog up with dirt easily.
customer_reviews.author: Butch77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my feet feel so much better with these than shoes
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price on Ariat mens boots. Guess this color and/or size isn't popular? Don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These boots are NOT waterproof as stated in the description. Not even a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Tarnecki

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great hiking boot. will buy again when i wear out this pair
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pirello

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, I have only wore them once. No issues
customer_reviews.author: Todd W

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fits as expected.wish the boots would of came in steel toe
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, and have held up great for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my shoes. They are just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This boot isn't very comfortable at all I purchased one similar to this a ...
customer_reviews.text: This boot isn't very comfortable at all I purchased one similar to this a little over a year ago in brown and they are by far a lot more comfortable than these are. Not sure if different colors are more comfortable or what...I have worn my brown pair to work on concrete floors and they are very comfortable...I have almost worn them out.
customer_reviews.author: purpleroses

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I really like my new boots
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with my boots is the laces. They are sort of slick. Other than that I really like my new boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ARIAT Mens Terrain Pro-M Terrain Pro Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: Crafted from waterproof leather and engineered with advanced comfort technologies, these endurance boots are perfect for any outdoor adventure.
feature_bullets: Waterproof, full grain leather upper Padded top collar
ATS Pro Advanced Torque Stability technology with composite forked shank
Performance riding boot approved for riding
